name: four pillars afghan square
notes:
create a stunning four pillars afghan square with this advanced beginner crochet pattern. the pattern includes a detailed photo tutorial and written instructions for a 12 inches x 12 inches square. 

 the four pillars afghan square is a free 12” x 12” overlay mosaic crochet pattern made with medium weight yarn and a 6 mm (j) crochet hook.
  
this design uses just two colors—red heart super saver in white and bitty stripes in sunset beach—with a total of 112 yds.
  
basic stitches (sc, dc, sl st, ch) make it beginner-friendly and fun to crochet.
  
designed for the annual bamcal (block-a-month crochet along).
  
**unique features-**
  
• advanced beginner level project
• mosaic crochet technique for a unique design
• includes written and photo tutorial instructions
• durable and easy-care red heart super saver yarn
• customize with your favorite color combinations
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• hook: 6mm (us size 10.0)
• yarn: super saver (solids) (aran weight, 111-112 yards)
